topics.definition: To stop sleeping and get out of bed.
topics.example: I wake up at 6 AM every morning.

topics.definition: To clean teeth using a toothbrush and toothpaste.
topics.example: After breakfast, I brush my teeth.

topics.definition: To wash the body using water and soap.
topics.example: I take a shower before going to work.

topics.definition: The first meal of the day, usually eaten in the morning.
topics.example: I eat breakfast with my family every day.
I go to work by bus.

topics.definition: A period of time when people stop work to eat lunch.
topics.example: I take my lunch break at 12 PM.

topics.definition: To come back to one's house or apartment.
topics.example: I return home from work at 6 PM.

topics.definition: Physical activity done to stay healthy or fit.
topics.example: I exercise at the gym three times a week.
I watch TV before going to bed.

topics.definition: The main meal of the day, usually eaten in the evening.
topics.example: We have dinner together as a family.

topics.definition: To look at and understand the meaning of written or printed matter.
topics.example: I like to read novels before sleeping.

topics.definition: To rest or do something enjoyable after work or effort.
topics.example: I relax by listening to music.

topics.definition: The natural state of rest in which the eyes are closed, the muscles are relaxed, and the mind is unconscious.
topics.example: I sleep for eight hours every night.

topics.definition: The days of the week that are not weekdays (Saturday and Sunday in many cultures).
A clock that can be set to sound an alarm at a desired time.
topics.example: I use an alarm clock to wake up early.

topics.text: John's daily routine starts early in the morning. He wakes up at 6 AM and brushes his teeth. After that, he takes a quick shower and eats breakfast with his family. Then, he goes to work by bus. During his lunch break, he eats a sandwich and drinks coffee. In the evening, he returns home at 6 PM, exercises at the gym, and has dinner with his family. After dinner, he relaxes by watching TV or reading a book. Finally, he sets his alarm clock and goes to sleep at 10 PM to prepare for the next day.

topics.definition: A person who wakes up and starts their day early.
topics.example: John is an early bird; he wakes up at 6 AM every day.

topics.definition: A phrase used to tell someone to wake up and get out of bed.
topics.example: Every morning, John's mom would say, 'Rise and shine!' to wake him up.
